step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open. Keep your shoulders relaxed.
You're doing great! Continue to stretch your arm overhead and keep your fingers open.
Excellent! You're making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together while inhaling. Remember to keep your arms pushing down.
Well done stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Focus on relaxing your shoulders as you extend.
Great completion of the first repetition! You're maintaining good form throughout the movement.
Starting the second repetition strong! Remember to keep your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
Good continuation. Keep that arm extended overhead and fingers spread wide.
Fantastic! You're effectively making a fist, squeezing shoulder blades, and inhaling. Keep pushing down.
Nicely done extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Focus on a smooth, relaxed return.
Excellent work completing all repetitions! You maintained good form and control throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Continue to focus on controlled movements and breathing.
